job_details.Vacaturetitel: Machine Learning Engineer II - Central ML
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer II - Central ML

* Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy in collaboration with scientists, scalable machine learning models and algorithms that provide content related insights and generative AI applications, ensuring scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
     * Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
     * Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications.
     * Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments. Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.
     * Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.
     * Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.
     * Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of generative AI applications, including specific mentions of GPT variants and creative content generation. It also highlights building RAG systems (implied by Q&A applications), fine-tuning (implied by developing generative models), and integrating these models into production-grade user-facing software systems, which are core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While ML Engineer tasks are present, the focus on generative models and their application in user-facing systems points more strongly to the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy... scalable machine learning models and algorithms' and 'Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such directly relate to the creation and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploying machine learning models: Design, develop and deploy... scalable machine learning models and algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications' explicitly mentions the development of generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI Development: Contribute to the development of generative models such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) variants or similar architectures for creative content generation, Q&A, translation or other innovative applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments.' describes the process of embedding ML models into software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Deployment and integration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate machine learning models into production systems. Ensure seamless deployment and efficient model inference in real-time environments.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.' directly refers to operational aspects of deployed models.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps to implement effective monitoring and maintenance strategies.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.' describes end-to-end service ownership including monitoring and performance management, which is an MLOps responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Owning a service end to end by actively monitoring application health and performance, setting and monitoring relevant metrics and acting accordingly when violated.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.' points to software engineering best practices for production readiness and continuous integration/delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintain clean, scalable code, ensuring reproducibility and easy integration of models into production environments, including CI/CD.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.' highlights the need to comprehend and translate business needs into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers, data scientists, and analysts to understand business requirements and translate them into machine learning solutions.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.' involves assessing and selecting appropriate model architectures based on various constraints.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating possible architecture solutions by taking into account cost, business requirements, emerging technologies, and technology requirements, like latency, throughput, and scale.
